Uses of Class
com.sri.kernel.Logger

Packages that use Logger
com.sri.kernel Provides the core classes of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.kernel.modules Contains classes which make up the module system of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.kernel.srml Provides classes for managing SRML elements and parsing SRML documents. 
 

Uses of Logger in com.sri.kernel
 

Methods in com.sri.kernel that return Logger
 Logger SR4Kernel.getLogger()
          Returns the Logger used by the kernel.
 

Constructors in com.sri.kernel with parameters of type Logger

          Initializes the underlying print stream to the specified logger and sets the user print stream to null.

Uses of Logger in com.sri.kernel.srml
 

Constructors in com.sri.kernel.srml with parameters of type Logger

          Creates a new parser with the given elements, and logger, using the InputStream [is] for reading the SRML.

          This initializes the list of SRML elements and adds the element "srml".
